entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this evening then changing to snow after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning.
